speechText: 'Hi, I am your Finacle Assistant! How may I help you ? I can do things like guiding you through Finacle transactions, Giving you Finacle menu names, Showing forms etc., Just click on any of the following or type, How do I perform Account Freeze? and I will walk you through how it needs to be done'
displayText: 'Hi, I am your Finacle Assistant! How may I help you ? I can do things like guiding you through Finacle transactions, Giving you Finacle menu names, Showing forms etc., Just click on any of the following or type, How do I perform Account Freeze? and I will walk you through how it needs to be done'

speechText: Thanks for using our services. Have a great day.
displayText: Thanks for using our services. Have a great day.

utterances: how do i close my account

speechText: 'Here are the below steps to close an account'
'To close an account,initial checks needs to be performed.'
'1.The account status needs to be active for closure.
'2.Lien should not me marked.
'3.The account should not have any linked loan accounts.
'4.The account should not have any cheques in clearing.
displayText: 'Here are the below steps to close an account'
'To close an account,initial checks needs to be performed.'
'1.The account status needs to be active for closure.
'2.Lien should not me marked.
'3.The account should not have any linked loan accounts.
'4.The account should not have any cheques in clearing.

speechText: Step 1.Invoke 'HACM'.
Step 2.Function Inquire.
Step 3.Account  ID: Enter the account number.
Step 4.Click on 'Go'.
Step 5.Click on 'Schme'.
Step 6.Account status: This field informs the status of the account.  If Active, proceed with the further steps.\If dormant or inactive, change the status to active and proceed.
Step 7.Click on 'Ok'.
displayText: Step 1.Invoke 'HACM'.
Step 2.Function Inquire.
Step 3.Account  ID: Enter the account number.
Step 4.Click on 'Go'.
Step 5.Click on 'Schme'.
Step 6.Account status: This field informs the status of the account.  If Active, proceed with the further steps.\If dormant or inactive, change the status to active and proceed.
Step 7.Click on 'Ok'.

utterances: how to check lien on account

speechText: 'For lien on the account,see below screen shot & following steps,'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HALM''
'Step 2.Function Inquire'
'Step 3.Account  ID: Enter the account number.'
'Step 4.Click on 'Go.'
'Step 5.If a Lien is marked, remove the lien from the account and proceed.'
displayText: 'For lien on the account,see below screen shot & following steps,'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HALM''
'Step 2.Function Inquire'
'Step 3.Account  ID: Enter the account number.'
'Step 4.Click on 'Go.'
'Step 5.If a Lien is marked, remove the lien from the account and proceed.'

speechText: 'To check freeze or unfreeze status,see below screen shot & following steps'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HAFSM'
'Step 2.Function Inquire
'Step 3.Account  ID: Select the account.
'Step 4.Click on 'Go'.
'Step 5.If Frozen, check for the reason. If it’s a customer induced freeze, change it into active. If it’s a bank induced freeze, reject the request of closing the account.
displayText: 'To check freeze or unfreeze status,see below screen shot & following steps'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HAFSM'
'Step 2.Function Inquire
'Step 3.Account  ID: Select the account.
'Step 4.Click on 'Go'.
'Step 5.If Frozen, check for the reason. If it’s a customer induced freeze, change it into active. If it’s a bank induced freeze, reject the request of closing the account.

speechText: 'For cheque clearing,see below screen shot & following steps,'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HOCI/HICI'
'Step 2.Function Inquire.'
'Step 3.Account  ID:select the account ID.'
'Step 4.Click on 'Go', view the details.'
'Step 5.If cheques are available for clearing, process the cheques.'
displayText: 'For cheque clearing,see below screen shot & following steps,'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HOCI/HICI'
'Step 2.Function Inquire.'
'Step 3.Account  ID:select the account ID.'
'Step 4.Click on 'Go', view the details.'
'Step 5.If cheques are available for clearing, process the cheques.'

speechText: 'For collecting charges,see below screen shot & following steps,'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HCACC'
'Step 2.Function: Collect.'
'Step 3.Account ID: select the account ID.'
'Step 4.Click on 'Go.'
'Step 5.This will list all the charges to be collected.'
'Step 6.Click on 'Submit.'
displayText: 'For collecting charges,see below screen shot & following steps,'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HCACC'
'Step 2.Function: Collect.'
'Step 3.Account ID: select the account ID.'
'Step 4.Click on 'Go.'
'Step 5.This will list all the charges to be collected.'
'Step 6.Click on 'Submit.'

speechText: 'For Calculation and applying interest rates,see below screen shot & following steps,'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HACINT'
'Step 2.Report To: Enter the name of the manger to address the report.'
'Step 3.From Account ID: select the account ID.'
'Step 4.To Account ID: select the account ID.'
'Step 5.Click on 'Submit.'
displayText: 'For Calculation and applying interest rates,see below screen shot & following steps,'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HACINT'
'Step 2.Report To: Enter the name of the manger to address the report.'
'Step 3.From Account ID: select the account ID.'
'Step 4.To Account ID: select the account ID.'
'Step 5.Click on 'Submit.'

speechText: 'For destroy cheque,see below screen shot & following steps,'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HCHBM'
'Step 2.Function: Destroy.'
'Step 3.Account ID: select the account ID.'
'Step 4.Begin Cheque no: Enter the cheque no.'
'Step 5.No of Leaves: Enter the total number of leaves to be destroyed.'
'Step 6.Click on 'Go.'
'Step 7.Click on 'Submit.'
displayText: 'For destroy cheque,see below screen shot & following steps,'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HCHBM'
'Step 2.Function: Destroy.'
'Step 3.Account ID: select the account ID.'
'Step 4.Begin Cheque no: Enter the cheque no.'
'Step 5.No of Leaves: Enter the total number of leaves to be destroyed.'
'Step 6.Click on 'Go.'
'Step 7.Click on 'Submit.'

speechText: 'For linked accounts, balance transfers and close,see below screen shot & following steps,'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HCAAC '
'Step 2.Function: Close.'
'Step 3.Account ID: select the account ID.'
'Step 4.Click on 'Go.'
'Step 5.Clear Balance displays the available amount. If any, check for settlement wither by CASH or by Transfer.'
'Step 6.Click on Closure tab.'
'Step 7.Check for linked accounts and delink if any. Note: For closure of account, the balance needs to be zero.'
'Step 8.On successful validations of the above mentioned steps, click submit to close the account.'
displayText: 'For linked accounts, balance transfers and close,see below screen shot & following steps,'
'Step 1.Invoke 'HCAAC '
'Step 2.Function: Close.'
'Step 3.Account ID: select the account ID.'
'Step 4.Click on 'Go.'
'Step 5.Clear Balance displays the available amount. If any, check for settlement wither by CASH or by Transfer.'
'Step 6.Click on Closure tab.'
'Step 7.Check for linked accounts and delink if any. Note: For closure of account, the balance needs to be zero.'
'Step 8.On successful validations of the above mentioned steps, click submit to close the account.'
